title: All these champions getting skins over and over are really making me upset!
body:
Am I the only one that wants more skins to: Diana, Syndra, Lissandra, Azir, Zed and other champions?
I really think these champions like Katarina, Annie and ashe getting skins all the time, is getting pretty unfair. 
First of all, they already have like at least 6-8 skins, why not give more skins to the other champions, I mean like Diana has 2 skins, that's a pretty small amount for being a champion since 2012. Syndra also has 2 skins, why not give her more just like Diana, are Riot that bad at ideas that they can't make skins for all the champions and more fair.

I main Diana and main mid, I want more skins to the mages and mid champs instead of all the usual champions getting skins and some players doesn't even like some of the new skins. 
Riot this is making me so bored that you always do like this. I have been waiting since forever after the Lunar Goddess came out, that was two years ago, what is the big deal? 
Just give them skins already or this will just be the reason for "lameness". Put your big ass brains together and give us something we want and are longing for and I know you can do it.
Look at the champs that needs more skins and stop making skins for only Teemo, Katarina, Ashe, Xin zhao, Garen and all the other damn champs with 20 skins each... look for the ones that needs some instead. 

I love League of Legends and Riot are making something really awesome with it and I like that, this is the first game I ever played this much and I just can't think I will ever be able to let it go 

Thanks for reading this and I don't think I'm the only one feeling like this about the skins
-CC sweetheart EUNE

Evelynn got an awesome skin just recently. Safecracker's not just her best looking skin, it radically changes her model.

Something that apparently no body seems to understand about skin design:

They don't pick champions to do skins for.  They just think up cool skin ideas for champions whenever they brainstorm one.

They don't go, "Hmm, everyone's whining about Zac, let's give him a skin."

They go, "Hmm, we need someone that fits the lunar festival theme... I know!  Jinx likes explosives, let's give her Chinese art-style rocket explosions in a new skin!"
true but it seems they aren't even putting up an effort for the "forgotten" champs {{item:3070}} {{champion:154}}

You have to remember that skins are the primary source of income for good ole Rito SO skins for popular champs will always be first in line.  The reason why certain champions have A LOT of skins (Teemo, Annie...) is because those skins sell often and A LOT.  That is what a good business done.

If you have 5% demand out of your player base for a particular skin, guaranteeing AT LEAST 50,000 purchases (just for example) or a unpopular champion who doesn't see much play with a 0.1% demand and only 1,000 if you are lucky???

Remember, whether a skin sells a couple hundred or a few thousand, they put the same amount of work into them for that respective tier.  I dunno about you, but if I owned by own restaurant and 95% of my customers LOVED the burger, and only 5% loved the pasta, I would go with the burger.

Cuz profits.

Wouldn't you?  If it was your business?  Would you rather make money or lose money?

Plz downvote me for logix...

Hey there Sweetheart!

A lot of the skins we've been seeing lately have been planned for awhile actually, just looking at Mecha Aatrox which was planned and done [before KateyKhaos was even working in the department ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/VELAEe48-kateykhaos-is-mecha-aatroxs-sword-supposed-to-be-stiff-as-cardboard?comment=0000) . We can assume that some of these other skins we're seeing have been in the works around the same amount of time, more or less.  It's about finding the best fitting idea, and working through what it can/should be, and this process can take some time, and there's also modeling and particles and whatnot. Just be patient! The champions you've mentioned will end up getting skins, in due time.

Hope this all helps :)

In her defense, she hasn't had a single skin past the base skin that actually gives her her real skin color. That's kinda annoying.

There are for sure some older ones that need skins. But a lot wont get one till they get a VU. Taric, Urgot and Eve being big ones on that list. 

Riven has quite a few already. Talon does too, but they are quite old. 

Zed is very overdue for a skin. As is Zac and Lucian. Hell Yasou got a skin before all of these guys if you don't count the limited skins. And those limited skins were just plain ones anyway. 

Lisssandra got a new skin not too-ish long ago. Syndra and Diana got some last year(not saying they can't have another one). And i would say both have very good skins in general. 

Annie, Kat and Ashe overall have mostly old skins. Anything that isn't is a limited skin. 

I don't think they are overdoing any of them. But there are some that are looking very ignored. Outside of the last 5 champions, Zed Zac and Lucian lack a non-limited skin outside of their release skins. Lucian being the newest of these 3 champions. And released a year and a half ago.
I'd just like to see a 1350+ Talon skin, and I'd be a happy chappie
I want a Syndra skin so bad... dodgeball ftw.
I want a Yorick Skin.

Keep in mind that some of these champions have a lot of skins simply because they've been around longer than others (Unless you're Zac :/ ) Annie, Kat and Ashe were some of the first champions the game had, so them having a lot of skins makes sense sense they've had a lot longer to accumulate them.

The most used champions are the ones who get the most skins. Most used champions are profit for Riot skin designers. They can make a skin design for least used champions but it has a rare chance of happening.
